title: Mid-Level Data Engineer
summary: Results-driven Data Engineer with 4 years of experience designing, building, and maintaining robust data pipelines and ETL processes. Proficient in Python, SQL, and cloud platforms like AWS, with a strong background in big data technologies and data warehousing solutions. Eager to contribute to scalable data architectures that drive business intelligence and operational efficiency.

cloud: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda, Glue, Athena, Kinesis, RDS)

description: Designed and implemented scalable ETL pipelines using Python, Apache Spark, and AWS Glue to process terabytes of data daily from various sources, reducing data processing time by 30%.
Managed and optimized data warehouse solutions on Amazon Redshift and Snowflake, improving query performance by 25% for analytics and reporting teams.
Developed and maintained data quality checks and monitoring systems using Airflow, ensuring data integrity and reliability for critical business dashboards.
Collaborated with data scientists and analysts to understand data requirements and deliver robust data models and datasets for machine learning initiatives.
Implemented CI/CD practices for data pipelines using AWS CodePipeline and Docker, improving deployment efficiency and reducing manual errors.
Assisted in the development and maintenance of ETL processes using Python and SQL for data ingestion into PostgreSQL databases.
Monitored data pipeline performance and troubleshoot issues, ensuring timely data availability for business operations.
Contributed to data modeling and schema design for new data sources, supporting the growth of the company's data infrastructure.
Generated ad-hoc reports and data extracts to support business intelligence requests and analytical projects.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
